name: Trade Wing
description:
Constructs the Trade Wing.
Spawns 3 Traders upon completion and acts as a Home Market.
The following trade technologies become available:
• Grand Bazaar (Feudal Age)
• Armored Caravans (Castle Age)
• Spice Roads (Imperial Age)
